minecraft.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game developed by Mojang Studios. Players interact with a fully modifiable three-dimensional environment made of blocks and entities. Its diverse gameplay lets you create, explore, gather resources, craft items, and combat.
minecraft.howToPlay: Start by punching trees to collect wood, then craft tools and build a shelter before night falls. Explore caves for resources, farm for food, and expand your world.
minecraft.tips: Always carry torches, food, and a bed. Build a secure shelter for the night and create landmarks to avoid getting lost.

fortnite.description: Fortnite is a free-to-play Battle Royale game with numerous game modes for every type of game player. Watch a concert, build an island or fight.
fortnite.howToPlay: Drop onto the island, gather weapons and resources, and be the last one standing. Build structures for protection and use the storm circle as a guide.
fortnite.tips: Learn to build quickly, always keep shield potions, and position yourself strategically as the storm circle shrinks.

amongus.description: Among Us is an online multiplayer social deduction game. Crewmates work together to complete tasks while trying to identify the Impostors among them.
amongus.howToPlay: Complete tasks around the map as a Crewmate, or sabotage and eliminate players as an Impostor without getting caught.
amongus.tips: Pay attention to other players' movements, use security cameras, and call emergency meetings when you find something suspicious.

roblox.description: Roblox is an online game platform and game creation system that allows users to program games and play games created by other users.
roblox.howToPlay: Browse thousands of games created by other users, or use Roblox Studio to create your own experiences.
roblox.tips: Try different games to find your favorites, make friends to play with, and consider learning Roblox Studio to create your own games.

action.title: Action Games
action.description: Experience exciting action games that challenge your reflexes. Action games focus on challenging the player's reflexes, hand-eye coordination, and reaction time.

adventure.title: Adventure Games
adventure.description: Embark on epic journeys and stories. Adventure games focus on exploration, puzzle-solving, and narrative storytelling.

puzzle.title: Puzzle Games
puzzle.description: Exercise your brain and solve interesting puzzles. Puzzle games focus on logical and conceptual challenges, often with increasing difficulty levels.

racing.title: Racing Games
racing.description: Feel the speed and competition in racing games. Racing games challenge players to finish first in competitive races while maintaining control of their vehicle.

sports.title: Sports Games
sports.description: Enjoy the thrill of sports in virtual form. Sports games simulate traditional physical sports such as soccer, basketball, and more.

strategy.title: Strategy Games
strategy.description: Plan, think, and outsmart your opponents. Strategy games focus on skillful thinking and planning to achieve victory.
